title: Distinctive Family Home with Verdant Sanctuary & Exclusive Comforts in Stare Miasto
description: Step into refined elegance with this expansive 5-bedroom, 2-bathroom residence nestled in the historic heart of Poznan’s Stare Miasto. Spanning a generous 230 sqm, this detached house harmoniously combines modern conveniences with tranquil surroundings. Indulge in spacious light-filled rooms, unwind in your private terrace, or retreat to the plush primary suite featuring an ensuite bathroom for utmost privacy. High-end finishes and premium motion-sensor exterior lighting add a distinct touch of sophistication and security.
neighborhood_description: Ideally positioned in the vibrant Stare Miasto, experience the exquisite balance of energetic city life and peaceful green escapes. This highly sought-after, growing neighborhood offers direct access to lush parks, scenic riverside walkways, and welcoming playgrounds ideal for children and families. With seamless public transport options and picturesque bike lanes at your doorstep, the area supports an active and outdoorsy lifestyle while characterized by a warm and supportive community spirit.
